update.Script:
SET @OrderQty="" SET @Focqty=""
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN -- This is - Not in Pail in Part Control SET @OTN='P' SET @OTN2='D' END ELSE BEGIN -- This is - in Pail in Part Control SET @OTPP='P' SET @OTPD='D' END

SET @OrderQty='' SET @Focqty=''
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN -- This is - Not in Pail in Part Control SET @OTN='P' SET @OTN2='D' END ELSE BEGIN -- This is - in Pail in Part Control SET @OTPP='P' SET @OTPD='D' END

SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN -- This is - Not in Pail in Part Control SET @OTN='P' SET @OTN2='D' END ELSE BEGIN -- This is - in Pail in Part Control SET @OTPP='P' SET @OTPD='D' END

SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN SET @OTNCTN='CTN' SET @OTND='D' END ELSE BEGIN SET @OTPP='P' END

update.Name: FromDate Validation

insert.Script:
if UserActivation = 1 then Checkbox = true
end

update.Script: Delete from OrderRel Where OrderHedID = @OrderHedID Delete from OrderDtl Where OrderHedID = @OrderHedID Delete from OrderPromotions where OrderHedID = @OrderHedID

update.Script:
SET @ChangeSellingPrice=0 SET @ChangeBasePrice=0 SET @Amount=0
SELECT @OHCompany = b.CompanyName, @OHCustNum = a.CustNum, @OHShipByDate=a.ReqShipDate, @OHShipToSysRowID=a.ShipToSysRowID, @OHShipToName=a.ShipToName, @OrderType = a.OrderType FROM OrderHed a INNER JOIN Company b ON a.CompanyID=b.CompanyID WHERE A.OrderHedID=@OrderHedID
IF @OrderType = 'N' BEGIN -- This is - Not in Pail in Part Control SET @OTN='P' SET @OTN2='D' END ELSE BEGIN -- This is - in Pail in Part Control SET @OTPP='P' SET @OTPD='D' END

insert.Script:
if @PartDescription like '%FOC%' then Focqty <> null
if @PartDescription not like '%FOC%' then OrderQty <> null

update.Script:
if @PartDescription like '%FOC%' then Focqty <> null
if @PartDescription not like '%FOC%' then OrderQty <> null

insert.Name: RefreshDataView
insert.Body:
<script type="text/javascript">
    Sys.Application.add_load(function () {
        $('div.TabBar td.Item').click(function () {
            var linkText = $(this).find('a').text();
            var tag = linkText;
            var dataView = Web.DataView.find(tag, 'Tag');
            if (dataView) {
                if (dataView._isBusy == false && dataView.get_isDisplayed())
                    dataView.refresh();

            }
        });
    })
</script>
